)bhrahma loke giyoth margapala awaboda karapu kenekgodak gatalu walin nidahaswa niwan dakinna puluwan..****************************************************************************************************oya aananthariya karma labapu ayata wena de kiwwe..anith ayata wenne athi wena chiththakshana anuwa ee pareyanna..meka pahadili karanna giyoth samahara ayatameka oonema naha kiyala hitheyi..ee nisa podiyata kiyannam..thamanta nithara purudu dewal anuwa,karmanu rupeea athi wena deyak anuwa,ahambauwak anuwa,upathal labanawa..ee upathata athi hakiyawa thiranayawenne ara man kiyapu chiththakshana anuwa..man kiyannam , hithanna mal puja karanawa mathak una kiyala..******hondata hithanna meka gana unandu wena aya witharak..****mal athata ganna ekada , mal dakina ekada , mal wala suwanda nahayatadanena ekada , ee suwada ekka wena deyak mathak wena ekada ,male hitapu kubiyek ganada , muwa elawanna oona kiyana ekada, podi karana ekada, wattiye pata ganada, wattiye kunu pallamakganada, budu rupe ganada , ee rupe inna ganada ee mohothe hithapihitiye ?
maslo ge awashyatha piramidaya mage widihat ee kale aahara kiwwama ithin elawaluyi, bathuyi, dhanya wargayi eeta amatharawa mas manshayi nowa thibune.
ee siddhiya mathak wana wita adatath ammage as walata kandulu enawa.
eeth ape gedara wage gawa maduwak hadala suruwam thiyala thibune na.

mathara-katharagama dumriya manga beliaththata 2018 di nimayi | pasal sisuwiyan 40k ragath indiya yathrawak anathuraka “mita kalin hamuwela thibunata ehema winoda wela naha – ethuma mata kiwwa mata wada oya hodata natanawane kiyala”

lekhawusiye sarasawiya sinama sangarawa ho sathi antha puwathpathak samaga labena wenath ee aakaraye sangara athirekayakin kalakaruweku samaga kerena sammatha achchuwe sammukha sakachchawakadi nirathura asenna wu prashnayak wu eya, balu balmata wadagathkamak nathi ekekayi sithuna da, aththatama kalakaruwa athiwima ho nathiwima pilibanda thiranathmaka thorathuru laba dena prashnayak bawa hondin wishleshanaya kara balana kala pene.
ratata kohomath aluth gamanak awashyayi.
drawida aya indiyawe, aprikawe ehema kalantharayak thisse innawa.
uura yanu asuchi pamanak nowa anekage ahe athi kunu wu thuwala, wana, gedi, mas wadelida gila damana daha jara sathweyeki.
kisiwak kara kiya gatha nohaki mama, "naha" yanna hagawimata, hisa depasata wanuwemi.
mita amatharawa nyashatika awi, jaiwa awi, lesar awi, praharaka guwan yana wani diyunu thakshanaki upakarana bhawitha kala bawata apata hamu wu sakshi bohomayi.
onna mama ada mansalata goda wenne lowa pura janapriya wuna bahubali chithrapatiya haduna hati gana poddak kiyanna.
onna joduwak innawa badu wagayak thiyagena.
meyin pradeshaye samanya janathawa thula athiwana hangima wanuye ‘katinaya wenuwenuth pansala apiwa surakanawa’ yana hangimayi.
“ee nanda hari hondayi neda amma?”
